    • Method Detail

      • splitByCommand

        public static java.util.List<java.util.List<com.peyrona.mingle.lang.lexer.Lexeme>> splitByCommand​(java.util.List<com.peyrona.mingle.lang.lexer.Lexeme> list)

      • splitByClause

        public static java.util.Map<com.peyrona.mingle.lang.lexer.Lexeme,​java.util.List<com.peyrona.mingle.lang.lexer.Lexeme>> splitByClause​(java.util.List<com.peyrona.mingle.lang.lexer.Lexeme> list,
                                                                                                                                           java.lang.String... asClauses)
        Traverses 'list' searching for passed clause(s) (no case). This method fills 'mapClauses' creating as many keys as passed clauses, and which values are Lists of Lexeme instances, those that corresponds to the clause.

        A value of null for a clause means this clause does not appear. A value of empty List for a clause means this clause appears but with no contents.
        Parameters:
        list - To traverse.
        asClauses - To split by.
        Returns:
        What explained.

      • splitByDelimiter

        public static java.util.List<java.util.List<com.peyrona.mingle.lang.lexer.Lexeme>> splitByDelimiter​(java.util.List<com.peyrona.mingle.lang.lexer.Lexeme> list)
        Returns a List of Lists obtained by splitting passed List using isDelimiter() as criteria.

        Items that satisfy the criteria are not included in returned lists.

        Parameters:
        list - Lexemes to split.
        Returns:
        A List of Lists obtained by splitting passed List using isDelimiter() as criteria.
